Ko si prisluhnemo, smo močnejši
04 Nov 2019, 12:12 by Oglasno Sporočilo

Dober delodajalec zna prisluhniti svojim sodelavcem in jim po najboljših močeh omogočiti pogoje za zadovoljstvo na delovnem mestu.



Medina Redžić, sodelavka v logistiki: “Rada imam prijetno vzdušje in dobre odnose med nami.”  

Zaposleni predstavljajo srce podjetja, a vsak od njih je tudi del posamezne ekipe, ki mora delovati podobno kot družina. Pogovor gradi zaupanje, zaupanje gradi odnos. Včasih je dovolj že prijazna beseda ali usmeritev. A pred tem mora podjetje poskrbeti za temelje zadovoljstva, kot so nadpovprečno plačilo v trgovinski panogi, dobri odnosi na delovnem mestu in takojšnja zaposlitev za nedoločen čas.
Medina Redžić, sodelavka v logistiki: “V podjetju imamo radi prijetno vzdušje in dobre medsebojne odnose.”
V podjetju HOFER redno izvajajo interno raziskavo zadovoljstva med sodelavci. Zadnja je na primer pokazala, da se 83 odstotkov sodelavcev v podjetju HOFER močno strinja, da njihova ekipa dosega cilje predvsem s sodelovanjem.
Ko si ekipa zaupa in sodeluje, se pojavi priložnost za dobro vzdušje.
Petra Štrukelj, vodja HR pri podjetju HOFER, je razložila: “Redno izvajamo interno raziskavo o zadovoljstvu med našimi sodelavci. Poleg tega skrbimo, da si sodelavci pomagajo pri delu ter da si podajajo enostavna in jasna navodila. Le tako lahko zagotovimo, da vsak razume svojo vlogo in doprinos k uspešnosti podjetja.”
A delodajalec mora najprej poskrbeti za trdne temelje in zadovoljstvo svojih sodelavcev na delovnem mestu. V primeru podjetja HOFER so to takojšnja zaposlitev za nedoločen čas, nadpovprečno plačilo v trgovinski panogi, skupinsko delo in zabavni “teambuildingi” oziroma neformalna srečanja.
Pridružite se HOFERjevi ekipi
Vsi, ki iščete novo priložnost in si želite postati del HOFERjeve ekipe, lahko preverite HOFER ugodnosti in prosta delovna mesta na karierni spletni strani kariera.hofer.si.
text:
When we listen, we are stronger
04 Nov 2019, 12:12 by Announcement Message

A good employer can listen to their employees and give them the best possible conditions for job satisfaction.



Medina Redžić, Associate in Logistics: "I like a pleasant atmosphere and good relations between us."

Employees represent the heart of the company, but each of them is also part of an individual team that needs to act similarly to the family. Conversation builds trust, trust builds relationship. Sometimes a kind word or direction is enough. But before that, the company has to take care of the basics of satisfaction, such as above-average pay in the trade industry, good job relationships and immediate employment for an indefinite period of time.
Medina Redžić, Associate in Logistics: "We love a pleasant atmosphere and good relationships with the company."
HOFER regularly conducts internal employee satisfaction surveys. The latter, for example, showed that 83 percent of HOFER associates strongly agree that their team achieves goals primarily through collaboration.
When the team trusts and works together, the opportunity arises for a good atmosphere.
Petra Štrukelj, Head of HR at HOFER, explained: “We regularly conduct an internal survey of satisfaction among our colleagues. In addition, we make sure that our colleagues help each other with their work and that they give simple and clear instructions. Only in this way can we ensure that everyone understands their role and contribution to the success of the company. ”
However, the employer must first ensure the solid foundations and satisfaction of its employees in the workplace. In the case of HOFER, these are immediate permanent employment, above-average pay in the trade, teamwork and fun teambuilding or informal meetings.
